Heading: Number of victims
Value: Convicted for 5 murders: Wendy Jordan, Robbin Brown, Rose Marie Felt, Monica Johnson, Kelly Jean Hood

Heading: 3 attempted murders:"Wilheminia Drane
column3: and another (unknown). He claimed to have killed at least 11 people"

Heading: Country where killing occurred
Value: United States, possible Thailand and Singapore

Heading: States where killing occurred
Value: Michigan, Illinois, possibly Virginia, North Carolina, and Hawaii

Heading: Raised by
Value: Mother, his father abandoned the family shortly after the death of his younger brother

Heading: Birth category
Value: Oldest (but was essentially the only child)

Heading: Family event
Value: He was traumatized by the death of an infant brother

Heading: Teased while in school?
Value: Yes, Armstrong told authorities he was the fat kid with an inferiority complex, bullied and teased mercilessly

Heading: Physically attractive?
Value: No, he was husky and weighed about 300lbs

Heading: Sexually abused?
Value: He was sexually abused as a child by his biological father

Heading: Highest grade in school
Value: Graduated from high school in New Bern, North Carolina

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Types of jobs worked
Value: US Navy Sailor, security guard, cashier, refueler, and a barbershop supervisor

Heading: Employment status during series
Value: Employed as a refueler for Detroit Metro Airport, Target, and a security guard for Novi

Heading: Number of children
Value: One son and wife pregnant at his arrest

Heading: Living with
Value: Spouse and her parents and their children

Heading: Time in forensic hospital?
Value: Spent one month in a mental hospital after locking himself in a bathroom because a girl from his high school was pressuring him to have sex

Heading: Killer age at start of series
Method of killing
Value: Strangled, claimed to have killed one man with a pipe

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?
Left at scene, no attempt to hide
Name and state of prison
Value:
Earnest C. Brooks Correctional Facility/ West 
Shoreline Correctional Facility, Muskegon Heights, Michigan
